messages.subject: FYI-Free Ben & Jerry's Ice Cream TODAY!!!!
messages.msgSnippet: For all you ice cream lovers.............,   Just got forwarded that Ben and Jerry s is giving out Free Scoops of ice cream to all today.    Not all stores
messages.messageBody:
For all you ice cream lovers.............,
 
Just got forwarded that Ben and Jerry's is giving out Free Scoops of ice cream to all today. 
 
Not all stores nationwide are partaking, so be sure to click onto the link below for partaking stores.
 
Here's the scoop  (pun intended!............  ~ Carol)

 
 

 
 As a way to thank our customers for their support and to celebrate 31 years of scooping the chunkiest, funkiest ice cream, frozen yogurt and sorbet, Ben & Jerry’s scoop shops are happily giving it away!

Around the world, Scoop Shops are opening
their doors from noon to 8:00 pm, to serve
up a free scoop of your favorite flavor.
Please check with your local Scoop
Shop for more info! Grab a pal and
come on down to have some good,
’scream fun on us!
 

 
Enjoy!!!!!
 

           Carol Reinhard 
          UWWG Coordinator
Unschoolers Winter Waterpark Gatherings
  http://groups.yahoo.com/group/UWWG/



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
